p: Hardness was measured on simulated HAZ samples with a load of 200 g, using a MICROMET5101 Vickers hardness tester (Matsuzawa Co., Ltd., Tokyo, Japan). Standard Charpy v-notch (CVN) impact tests were performed on simulated samples with a different cooling rate at −60 °C, using a NI500A imapct tester (NCS Co., Ltd., Beijing, China) on specimens of dimensions 10 × 10 × 55 mm 3.
